title: Services services overview
description: GWCIM Services effectively combine conventional and evidence-based complementary and alternative modalities.
cleaned_text: effectively combine conventional and evidence-based complementary and alternative modalities. At GWCIM we provide: - A health care program based in science and tradition where the patient is treated as a whole person and respected as an individual. - Personal empowerment and responsibility in order to attain optimal health. - A care plan tailored to fit individual needs and honoring the personal healing process. Our clinicians spend generous amounts of time with you to get to know you and to learn how your condition affects your life. [Full List of Services
